name: Mysterious Orb
text: I was following you... Hopefully, I didn't scare you.

name: Mysterious Orb
text: Anyway, this forest needs your help.

name: Mysterious Orb
text: As you can see, the spirits, who are supposed to protest this land, are sleeping.

name: Mysterious Orb
text: I don't know what happened to them...

name: Mysterious Orb
text: Please, find a way to wake them up.
